help-improve.description: Let us know about any of your ideas, suggestions, or comments by reporting issues or creating pull requests on GitHub. You can also send messages via Twitter or Email.
help-improve.title: How to improve this page

synopsis.description: Visible is not just a linter, we also provide information on how to make your website accessible. We indicate which part you need to fix, give you patches of codes, give you references to the standards â€” to help you to learn and improve the accessibility of your website.
synopsis.title: Less pain, more accessible

automation.description: Unlike other tools, Visible also provides patches to fix the a11y issues so you donâ€™t need to search for information of the error and helps you to focus more on coding
automation.title: Suggestion

ci.description: Visible is also available on command-line, so you can use it on continuous integrations services and monitor the website is fine.
ci.title: Command-line

learn.description: Visible always inform you which exact codes are violating rules which means you can learn more about accessibility as you code
learn.title: Learn about A11y

home.description: Visible is a tool-chain that helps developers to build websites in the perspective of accessibility
home.title: Is your website visible?

meta.description: ðŸ¦‰ Visible is an open-source accessibility testing tool works on Node.js and CI
meta.title: Visible

newsletter.description: We will keep you informed of the latest news about the product! In case if you interested in Visible and accessibility, please fill the form below to sign up for the newsletter including announcements of beta testing.
newsletter.title: Sign up for beta, now!

newsletter-form.description: We will send an email about once a month. You can unsubscribe from the newsletter anytime you want.
newsletter-form.title: Newsletter

page-placeholder.description: This feature is implementing in progress. Motivate us by starring the repository on <2>GitHub</2>!
